ItemTooltips.mekansm: Great support item; nice stats and a great active too.
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: Buy this early and if you know that you're going to build this item start with str gloves instead of int mantle.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: Hex is too good... but expensive.
ItemTooltips.orchid: The silence and the bonus attack speed makes this  a usually must have on WR.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: ''I sense a great disturbance in the force.''
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Acceptable stats, good item that gives HP so you won't be a total glass cannon.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: For the armor of some sort.
ItemTooltips.sphere: Is Lina or Lion in the enemy team? Get this.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: If the enemy carry is unhitable cuz of Butterfly.
ItemTooltips.maelstrom: The passive is great for farming. Get this asap after phase. If you are doing well you can upgrade this into a Mjollnir.
ItemTooltips.desolator: If you can farm this at around 15-18 mins you will own your enemies so hard. Combine it with a Medallion of Courage for total OPness.

AbilityTooltips.windrunner_shackleshot: Really good stun but needs to be targeted well to be maximum effective.
AbilityTooltips.windrunner_powershot: Your main damage source max this asap and spam it whenever you can.
AbilityTooltips.windrunner_windrun: Get this first to avoid an early gank and FB otherwise this is a really good escape and offensive tool.
AbilityTooltips.windrunner_focusfire: Rapid fire. Nothing really special about it. Don't get it at 6 cuz you probably wont have enough damage for this spell to be effective.
